item.title: 国际货币基金组织将阿根廷 2025 年的储备目标放宽 50 亿美元
item.description: 国际货币基金组织在阿根廷本月未能达到一项关键基准后给予了阿根廷喘息的空间，使该国更容易继续执行其 200 亿美元的融资计划。【原文：The International Monetary Fund gave Argentina breathing room on a key benchmark after it missed the target this month, making it easier for the country to continue with its $20 billion funding program.】

item.title: 伯克希尔哈撒韦公司出售 12.1 亿美元的 VeriSign 股票
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway 和 Warren E Buffett 向美国证券交易委员会报告了 VeriSign Inc.【原文：Berkshire Hathaway and Warren E Buffett reported an insider transaction in VeriSign Inc. stock to the US Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 特朗普势头推动稳定币成为亚洲金融中心的迫切需求
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对与美元挂钩的加密货币的拥护，亚洲市场正在匆忙更新其稳定币规则，这给该地区当局带来了新的紧迫感。【原文：Asian markets are hurriedly updating their stablecoin rules as President Donald Trump’s embrace of US dollar-pegged cryptocurrencies instills a fresh sense of urgency among the region’s authorities.】

item.title: 墨西哥沃尔玛首席执行官伊格纳西奥-卡里德突然辞职
item.description: 美国零售商沃尔玛墨西哥公司（Wal-Mart de Mexico SAB）称，公司首席执行官伊格纳西奥-卡里德（Ignacio Caride）递交了辞呈，将从今天开始离开公司最高职位。【原文：Wal-Mart de Mexico SAB, the local unit of the US retailer, said Chief Executive Officer Ignacio Caride presented his resignation and is leaving the company’s top job, effective today.】

item.title: 萨克斯看到大块新贷款已以折扣价提供
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，陷入困境的零售商萨克斯全球企业（Saks Global Enterprises）一个多月前获得的一笔新贷款的一部分，在关键的债务置换截止日期到来之前，正在二级市场上以低于面值的价格出售。【原文：Portions of a new loan that struggling retailer Saks Global Enterprises obtained a little more than a month ago were being offered in the secondary market at below-par prices ahead of a key debt swap deadline, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 万斯和劳工部吹捧特朗普现在痛恨的就业数据
item.description: 副总统万斯和劳工部长洛里-查韦斯-德雷默（Lori Chavez-DeRemer）在他们的上司唐纳德-特朗普总统解雇负责监督数据的人员前几小时，试图对疲软的就业数据进行积极的解读，他们在没有证据的情况下声称，这份令人沮丧的报告是出于政治动机。【原文：Vice President JD Vance and Labor Secretary Lori Chavez-DeRemer sought to put a positive spin on weak jobs numbers hours before their boss, President Donald Trump, fired the person who oversees the data, claiming without evidence that the dour report was politically motivated.】

item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官在长达一小时的动员讲话中告诉员工人工智能是 "属于我们的"。
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）在财报发布后召开了一次罕见的全体员工会议，围绕公司的人工智能前景和 "令人惊叹 "的产品线，对员工进行了动员。【原文：Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook, holding a rare all-hands meeting following earnings results, rallied employees around the company’s artificial intelligence prospects and an “amazing” pipeline of products.】

item.title: Blackstone 出售自 2008 年金融危机以来最大的英国 CMBS
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 出售了超过 15 亿英镑（20 亿美元）的债券，这些债券由 Haven 运营的英国度假公园提供支持，这是自 2008 年金融危机以来最大的英镑计价商业抵押证券。【原文：Blackstone Inc. sold more than £1.5 billion ($2 billion) in bonds backed by UK holiday parks operated by Haven, the largest ever pound-denominated commercial mortgage security since the 2008 financial crisis, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普向俄罗斯施压，对冲基金匆忙投入看涨石油的赌注
item.description: 对冲基金以一个多月来最快的速度提高了对原油的看涨押注，原因是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对俄罗斯征收额外关税，引发了市场对供应收紧的担忧。【原文：Hedge funds boosted their bullish bets on crude oil at the fastest pace in over a month as US President Donald Trump’s threat of additional levies on Russia drove fears about tighter supplies.】

item.title: 丹格特聘请前壳牌高管担任炼油业务首席执行官
item.description: 亿万富翁阿里科-丹格特（Aliko Dangote）聘请了壳牌石油公司前高管大卫-伯德（David Bird）领导其炼油和石化公司，这位尼日利亚富豪将开始下一个项目，即建设一个港口，以支持其工业帝国的快速发展。【原文：Billionaire Aliko Dangote has hired David Bird, a former executive of Shell, to lead his refinery and petrochemical firm as the Nigerian tycoon embarks on his next project of building a port to support the rapid growth of his industrial empire.】

item.title: 巴克莱称电子交易蓬勃发展，信贷流动性溢价消失
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，由于电子交易和组合交易的蓬勃发展，投资者为持有较难出售的投资级债券而要求的额外补偿已经消失。【原文：The additional compensation investors demand to own tougher-to-sell investment-grade bonds has vanished, thanks to a boom in electronic and portfolio trading, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 惠誉将墨西哥石油公司的评级提高两级
item.description: 在墨西哥政府在全球债务市场上出售 120 亿美元以帮助支撑该钻井公司的财务状况后，惠誉评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将墨西哥石油公司的评级提升。【原文：Fitch Ratings upgraded Petroleos Mexicanos after the government sold $12 billion in global debt markets to help shore up the driller’s finances.】

item.title: 关键的 Codelco 铜矿坍塌给生产前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 在对金属的需求不断增长之际，Codelco 公司最大矿山的一个关键新矿段发生重大坍塌事故，使人们对这家智利巨头实现生产目标的能力产生了疑问。【原文：A major collapse at a key new section of Codelco’s biggest mine is raising questions about the Chilean behemoth’s ability to meet production goals at a time of growing demand for the metal.】

item.description: 关税和经济的不安情绪导致 S&P 500 指数下跌 1.8%，创下 4 月份以来最差的一天，期权市场的情况表明，市场对经济下滑的担忧依然存在。【原文：With tariff and economic jitters dragging the S&P 500 Index down 1.8% for its worst day since April, a look at the options market suggests fear of a downturn remains.】

item.title: 2020 年以来最大的就业修正暴露了经济数据的陷阱

item.title: Airbnb 与纽约市市长候选人就租房禁令进行良好会谈
item.description: 在向纽约市长竞选投入超过 100 万美元之后，Airbnb 公司表示，它正在与候选人就限制措施进行 "非常好的对话"，这些限制措施抹去了该市 80% 以上的房源。【原文：After pouring more than $1 million into New York’s mayoral race, Airbnb Inc. said it’s having “really good conversations” with candidates about restrictions that wiped more than 80% of its listings in the city.】

item.title: 中标财团誓言在几内亚西芒杜进行负责任的开采
item.description: 在几内亚开发世界上最大的未开发铁矿石矿藏的赢家西芒杜财团（Winning Consortium Simandou）表示，它正在与当局和社区密切合作，以解决与该项目有关的环境问题。【原文：Winning Consortium Simandou, one of the companies developing the world’s biggest untapped iron ore deposit in Guinea, has said that it is working closely with authorities and communities to address environmental concerns linked with the project.】

item.title: 瑞士推动关税协议在与特朗普的激烈通话中遇阻
item.description: 瑞士与唐纳德-特朗普在第 11 个小时的通话为美国提供了一次残酷的现实检验：除非美国总统亲自签署，否则贸易协议就不是协议。【原文：Switzerland’s 11th-hour phone call with Donald Trump offered the nation a harsh reality check: A trade deal isn’t a deal unless the US president personally closes it.】
